title: Require a sans-serif to go with Minion pro
content:
Hi,  
i’m designing a document that has minion pro as the body text. I’d like to use a sans-serif for captions and titles. Any suggestions?  
Thanks!

 [‹ Good "square" font.](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821165133/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46481 "Go to previous forum topic") [Best font for a speech text? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821165133/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46278 "Go to next forum topic")
author: jenricae

comments.content: You could do worse than borrow from Bringhurst and use Scala Sans. (He uses Minion Pro and Scala Sans in the Elements of Typographic Style.)
Spiekermann always used to tell people to use Minion with Meta. Probably not so much anymore ;)
